task.title: How to Make Vanilla Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: Once the machine in turned on and you've selected the "ice cream" option on the control panel, you're ready to make your ice cream. This task will tell you how to make vanilla ice cream.

taskbody.context:
Incredients include:
1.5 cups of whole milk
1 cup and 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar
1 pinch of kosher salt
3 cups of heavy cream
1.5 tablespoons of pure vanilla extract Steps:

step.cmd: Combine all of the incredients in a cup or bowl
Pour the combined ingredients into the cap with measurement cup
Select "ice cream" on the control panel
Let the ice cream churn and thicken for 20-25 minutes
Place ice cream into a tub, place into a freezer for about 10-15 minutes.
Take ice cream out of freezer, scoop the desired amount into a bowl and enjoy!
step.stepresult: If the steps above are correctly followed, then you have successfully made vanilla ice cream.
